de.jannlab.core

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.core.Layer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class Layer
extends Object
implements Serializable
    An instance of this class defines a Layer in ANN. It contains some information on the CellArray corresponding to this layer and some other computational specification (e.g. the computational dependencies of the containing CellArrays).

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int arrayslbd
      Gives the lower bound of the arrays contained by this layer.
      int arraysnum
      Gives the number of the arrays contained by this layer.
      int arraysubd
      Gives the upper bound of the arrays contained by this layer.
      int cellslbd
      Gives the lower bound of the cells contained by this layer.
      int cellsnum
      Gives the number of the cells contained by this layer.
      int cellsubd
      Gives the upper bound of the cells contained by this layer.
      int[] complbds
      Gives the lower bounds of the packages of computational independent arrays.
      int[] compubds
      Gives the uppder bounds of the packages of computational independent arrays.
      int compwidth
      Gives the number of the packages of computational independent arrays.
      int indeg
      Gives the degree of incoming connections to all cells contained by all array in this layer.
      static int NO_LAYER 
      int outdeg
      Gives the degree of outgoing connections of all cells contained by all array in this layer.
      int tag
      Gives the tag of the layer, which contains information of its computational behavior.

      • arraysnum

        public int arraysnum
        Gives the number of the arrays contained by this layer.

      • complbds

        public int[] complbds
        Gives the lower bounds of the packages of computational independent arrays. Arrays with the same computation index are computed at the same time.

      • compubds

        public int[] compubds
        Gives the uppder bounds of the packages of computational independent arrays. Arrays with the same computation index are computed at the same time.

      • compwidth

        public int compwidth
        Gives the number of the packages of computational independent arrays.

      • indeg

        public int indeg
        Gives the degree of incoming connections to all cells contained by all array in this layer.

      • outdeg

        public int outdeg
        Gives the degree of outgoing connections of all cells contained by all array in this layer.

      • tag

        public int tag
        Gives the tag of the layer, which contains information of its computational behavior.
